actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tax-exempt bonds may not be used to provide a hospital or other health care facility if the facility performs abortions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny an exemption for interest on any tax-exempt bond that is used to finance a health care facility that performs abortions while the bond is outstanding.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tax-exempt bonds may not be used to provide a hospital or other health care facility if the facility performs abortions.
